channel.title: BillyOh - Creating an Ideal Garden Lifestyle for You
channel.description: BillyOh - Creating an Ideal Garden Lifestyle for You

item.title: Help & Advice
item.description:
Help & Advice

We've put together a series of helpful articles full of useful tips for maintaining your garden furniture, outdoor buildings and other gardening tips.

item.title: Thêm bài toán lớp 3 khiến tiến sĩ bó tay - VnExpress
item.description:
Thêm bài toán lớp 3 khiến tiến sĩ bó tay - VnExpress

Chuẩn bị cho con trai đang học lớp 3 dự kỳ thi đánh giá năng lực Toán học quốc tế 2015 (IMAS 2015) , chị Thiên Hương (Cầu Giấy, Hà Nội) tìm các đề thi cũ cho bé làm quen.

item.title: The See-Saw Of Password Security And UsabilityLink
item.description:
The See-Saw Of Password Security And UsabilityLink

A user’s account on a website is like a house. The password is the key, and logging in is like walking through the front door. When a user can’t remember their password, it’s like losing their keys. When a user’s account is hacked, it’s like their house is getting broken into.

item.title: Clipping FactsLink
item.description:
Clipping FactsLink

Scalable Vector Graphics (or SVG) lend developers an incredible ability to display crisp, beautiful graphics at any size or resolution. SVG can also be animated using various techniques. In combination with clipping paths, interesting effects can be achieved.

item.title: User Experience Is More Than A Single User InterfaceLink
item.description:
User Experience Is More Than A Single User InterfaceLink

I am a user experience designer. But you wouldn’t recognize me as one. I don’t often use Photoshop, Skitch or any other graphics package. You will rarely find me designing hero banners or carousels. I don’t even find myself wireframing much these days. Even so, I do design the experiences of users.

item.title: Getting Started on The Grid
item.description:
Getting Started on The Grid

Creating a Site

Welcome to The Grid Beta, we’re excited to have you onboard! Here are a few quick tips to get you up and running.
